about.title: TdyTime
about.description: Smart teaching schedule visualization and management tool. Specially designed for Faculty at College Division - University of Medicine and Pharmacy, Hue University.
about.note: Note: Theory (LT) periods are 45 minutes each. Practice/Integrated (TH) periods are 60 minutes each.

history.title: Daily Focus
history.description: Optimized Today tab for daily actionable tasks.
features: Clean UI: Removed visual noise, added quick text links.
Performance: Instant PWA load < 1s, system fonts.

changes: Premium Refinement: Optimized the Settings and Statistics views for better visual balance and information density.
Auto-Logic: Implemented intelligent course type assignment and automatic name shortening across all views.
Stability Pro: Fixed navigation edge cases and improved code robustness for a smoother experience.
Data-Centric Today: Complete redesign of the Today tab with data-first philosophy, optimized for instructors and senior users.
Session Status System: Three-tier session status (Upcoming / In Progress / Completed) with clear visual distinction.
Semester Intelligence: Smart semester boundary detection with 4 specialized empty states.
Mobile-First Cards: Optimized 3-column mobile layout (Time | Info | Room) with standardized display priority.
System Refactor: Comprehensive code audit and refactoring, achieving 100% logic safety and stability.
Performance Core: Optimized rendering performance with Memoization technology, eliminating calculation bottlenecks.
Clean Utilities: Standardized date processing (ScheduleUtils), reducing 30% code duplication and enhancing reliability.
Smart Filtering: Intuitive filtering system that auto-hides for cleaner focus, featuring active indicators.
Privacy Mode: Flexible security feature on the Stats page to conceal detailed metrics when needed.
Mobile Horizontal Scrolling: Standardized horizontal scroll experience for weekly schedules on mobile devices.
Visual Unification: Comprehensive synchronization of 2xl border radius and UI terminology across the app.
Premium Minimal Language: Elegant and refined design philosophy featuring Glassmorphism and data-centric layouts.
Semester Timeline: All-new semester timeline experience with smart navigation and space optimization.
Insights Card: Next-gen analytical cards transforming raw data into vibrant, actionable insights.
Visual Performance: Optimized fluid transaction effects for a premium native app feel.
Welcome Center: Reimagined landing space built on professional app standards with aesthetic TdyTime branding.
Conflict Intelligence: Automated analytical engine detecting time and space overlaps for 100% schedule accuracy.
Smart History: Instant memory and access for recent schedules, eliminating the need for data re-uploads.
Interface Polish: Refined UI components (Tabs, Toasts, Badges) for unified completion.
Mobile Prowess: Redefined mobile experience with intuitive bottom Tab Bar and natural swipe navigation.
Identity Refresh: Updated icons and splash screens following modern PWA standards.
Dashboard Insights: Upgraded distribution charts and summary cards for 3-second schedule grasp.
Executive Dashboard: Full redesign of the Statistics view towards clean management aesthetics.
Color-Coded Alerts: Visual alert system using color language to identify hotspots and overload weeks instantly.
The Blue Revolution: Standardized professional Blue/Teal color palette, eliminating legacy design inconsistencies.
Skeleton Shimmer: Integrated modern loading effects for an uninterrupted user experience.
Analytics Launch: First-ever teaching density analysis system with intuitive Heatmap visualizations.
Parser Engine: Upgraded data processing engine for high-accuracy UMS system integration.
Genesis: Foundation architecture established, focusing on raw schedule parsing into digital formats.

success.loadedPast: Schedule loaded successfully! Past semester data (Ended {{date}}).
success.loadedFuture: New schedule loaded! Semester starts on {{date}}.
success.loadedCurrent: Schedule loaded successfully. Navigating to current week.

error.demoNotFound: ❌ Demo data not found for code: {{code}}
